history.proof: intros T f v t H. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t)

Premises:
System = fol.System LNN : Type
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNN : fol.System LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> Prop
Formula = fol.Formula LNN : Set
forallH : nat -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
substituteFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
forallI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (forallH v f)
contradiction : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH f) -> SysPrf T g
impE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T f
forallE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t)
existI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f)
iffI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (iffH f g)
iffE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
andI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (andH f g)
impI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
cp1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH (notH f) (notH g)) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
cp2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (impH (notH f) (notH g))
nnI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH (notH f))
nnE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (notH (notH f)) -> SysPrf T f
andE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T f
orI1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
orE : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (orH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T h
orI2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
andE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T g
iffE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f g)
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f
sysExtend : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNN) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f
orSys : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (orH f g)) h
noMiddle : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (orH (notH f) f)
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T f
subProp.subFormulaNil : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) f)
folReplace.reduceSub : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (f g : fol.Formula L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) (substituteFormula L g v s))
subWithEquals : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (a b : fol.Term L) (T : fol.System L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L a b) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L (substituteFormula L f v a) (substituteFormula L f v b))
subProp.freeVarSubTerm4 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L t)
folLogic.forallI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f)
subProp.subTermNil : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> substituteTerm L t v s = t
subProp.freeVarSubTerm1 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L t) -> v <> x -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
forallSimp : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
subProp.freeVarSubTerm2 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
subProp.freeVarSubFormula4 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In x (freeVarFormula L f)
subProp.freeVarSubFormula1 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), v <> x -> In x (freeVarFormula L f) -> In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s))
subProp.freeVarSubFormula2 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s))
subAll.subSubAllFormula : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L (subAll.subAllFormula L f m) v s) (subAll.subAllFormula L f (fun n : nat => substituteTerm L (m n) v s)))
subProp.subFormulaNTE : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L), (forall (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) f)) /\ (forall (v1 v2 : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v2 (ListExt.list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarFormula L f)) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f v1 (fol.var L v2)) v2 s) (substituteFormula L f v1 s))) /\ (forall (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L...
subFormulaNot : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteFormula L (fol.notH L f) v s = fol.notH L (substituteFormula L f v s)
FA1 : forall (L : Language) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), Prf L nil (fol.impH L (fol.forallH L v A) (substituteFormula L A v t))

```coq
intros T f v t H.
apply forallE with (LNN) T (forallH v f) v t.
apply FA1.
apply sysExtend with (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (forallH v f)).
unfold Included. intros x Hx. right. apply Hx.
apply Axm. left. reflexivity.
apply forallI with (T) (substituteFormula LNN f v t).
intro Hfree. apply Hfree.
apply H.
Qed.```

original: intros T f v t H. apply forallE with (LNN) T (forallH v f) v t. apply FA1. apply sysExtend with (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (forallH v f)). unfold Included. intros x Hx. right. apply Hx. apply Axm. left. reflexivity. apply forallI with (T) (substituteFormula LNN f v t). intro Hfree. apply Hfree. apply H.
